text: Room veeeeery big , comfortable big bed , hot shower , lush garden , pool and breakfast for 130k IDR in high season : what U want more ? Ok , no towel or sheet but . .

Beautiful , comfortable and friendly hotel near the beach . Great value for the money . Good situation , next to a big mall and the beach . Rooms really comfortable , clean and no noisy . Wifi excellent .

room without power plug point , hair dryer , water boiler , safe box and even tissue . They don ' t have any queen size bed as well . people were friend but all yr request then will not care . its very small and the wifi is totally suck here .

The accomodation was great given the price 30 $ per night i got from booking . com . the hotel was clean and two swiming pools to cool off the bali heat . The location - seminyak is great , great for a chilled out people . Very close Peti ( something ) and seminyak beach a taxi will offset you less than 3 $ .

For the price this hotel excellent . Rooms are large and comfortable . Pool area was a bit rundown but functional . Location suited me but a lot of building work going on in streets nearby . Overall this hotel exceeded my expectations for the money I paid .

We stayed at the Maharani with another five friends and had the best time . Staff great friendly and entertaining . Rooms light , airy and clean . They accommodated us by putting all our rooms together side by side . Great location on poppies lane 1 and beach across the road , short walk to markets and shopping . Would recommend a stay here as when we return will be staying again .

This is good hotel for you stay for a while in Singaraja if you find good and cheap hotel . The view is good near of the beach and it has 1 swimming pool . The bedroom is clean and service is good . But the parking is not large enough .

Great friendly staff awesome manager and security ! Very small pool - a glass door and window separates u from mac Donald ' s ! But u can order mc Donald ' s while sitting in the pool ! Awsome cocktails ! Breaky is not amazing but simple ! I have stayed at the Ramayana hotel kuta and I prefer that !

We paid $ 40 for the deluxe room . There wasn ' t anything wrong with the room really but the photos the website shows were probably taken 15 years ago . The room is old and so is the bathroom . The king bed was just two singles pushed together . There was hot water and the place was clean though , breakfast was included and was tasty .

Pro : nice staff , good breakfast , pool quiet , room was nice but had few small issues ( below ) , location was the absolute best . Cons : shower drains were clogged and shower temperature either boiling or freezing . Overall I enjoyed my stay . Would definitely recommend .

no one helped us with out luggages . we stayed here 2nights . it was really one midnight and we have to call the reception but the reply was terrible to understand that they just checked in . we never had a good sleep during our stay . it was a clean with a fast wifi and a good breakfast service though . .

A small hotel with a decent bed and adequate facilities . Breakfast was mediocre and the menu was the same everyday . Some changes in variety would be an improvement . Staff was friendly . There is a church nearby the hotel about 5 mins walk and a small shopping mall opposite the church . The beach is rather far and a 10 min walk . Overall an average place to stay .

we book one room with extra bed . the room was spacious and comfortable . the hotel have a pool not too big but nice . the breakfast excellent . they have rent car also rent motorcycle . near to legian street , kuta beach also another place . will recommend this place to everyone who need the hotel budget with nice facilities .
No Daily Compliment water , No small refrigerator , no buffet drink and fruit for breakfast . But still clean and quite . Need to change the bed , but still oke . Overall you get what you pay .

stay for 3 nights in standard room . 2 min walk to lippo mall and 10 min walk to discovery mall . 10 min walk to kuta beach . very strategy location . lodge a report on hot condition of aircon and immediate action taken . breakfast nt much variety but tasty .

Good concept with unique design We got compliment " welcome popcorn " at restaurant . . Oxtail soup is the best menu & very recommended . . Room clean , all staff are friendly and helpful . . they have morning dance . . Love it Will definetly back . . Thank you fame hotel .

Plus : Hotel staff are very nice , professional and very helpful . Minus : The hotel does not fulfill 5 star requirements . Quite expensive but poor maintenance of hotel amenities and facility . The hotel including breakfasts is opted for Chinese tour bus groups . Hope for the best , prepare for the worst . Cannot recommend this hotel .

Nice and quiet hotel . Not far from discovery or lipo mall . Close to the main kuta strip , close to the airport but without the noise from the planes . Staff are exceptionally helpful , friendly and welcoming . Room service excellent and room clean and tidy . Air - conditioning nice and cold and very big beds . Very good value !

A great boutique hotel that has amazing staff and service . Very relaxing here , you arrive and instantly decompress , its as if the entire resort is a spa ! The pool downstairs looks almost too beautiful to swim in , very fountain like .

We stay here because we have plan to do trekking at Mount Batur . nice hotel located in a mountain cliff shelf that has beautiful scenery . We stayed at this hotel for 2 days with my husband . we would recommend this hotel to travelers who will come to Bali .

The pool is ok , gym oke . The property looks better in pictures . The rooms are ok but needs maintenance . Not much options in breakfast . poor service etiquette and communication skills by the staff , overall not good .

Last night I stayed on this hotel , their receptionis quite good , only 3minutes for check - in registration . But this hotel are full with mosquito , I must ask for mosquito repellent to their front desk . Guests must bring own toothbrush and tooth paste , because they not provide these item .
This hotel is in a great location and such good value for money as it is a budget hotel but it is really nice inside and the rooms were great , good aircon , comfy beds , no issues at all .

its recommend hotel for buleleng area , close to mall and restaurant , but no pool under 6 years . morning bites need variation , friendly staff , non smoking room its very good choice for family , the price is worth it .

A nice and comfortable Hotel . Nice and helpful staf . Don ' t eat the food in the resturant though , not even the breakefast ! Very disapointing ! But there are a few good places down the road and everything else Is really good .

We were booked into the Aston by our travel agent . During our stay in Bali we needed to book another at a different part of our trip and decided to stay at the Aston again . We would highly reccomend it to anyone wanting to stay somewhere near the airport .

Wanna plan for Meeting , I will fully recommmend to stay and book your valuable meeting with Fame Sunset . Amazing food , Amazing meeting room with motivational quotes , clear LCD Projector , Boombastic Sound System . . . Satisfaction guaranteed ! ! ! !

We only stayed one night as in transit to Lembongan . It ' s a cheap place to stay . Room was clean , bed was comfy , breakfast was average . Pool area could do with some maintenance , decking in some areas lifting around pool . Pool was refreshing . Good location , close to main area of Kuta . Suited our family for a nights stay .

My family and I were looking forward to living at this lovely hotel with the amenities and services provided . Yes , it was a perfect short stay given by this team . It also includes a location close to an exciting area in Bali . Well done .

I stayed 3 nights at this hotel , situated right next to the airport . Location is just prefect , walk able distance to the beach , restaurants , spa ' s . best value for money . Totally worth it . i will recommend this hotel to all .

Hotel is just steps away from Kuta Beach . Big room but Breakfast need improvement and don ' t stay in room 407 as they will " Parked " that cleaning cart just beside your door . : ( Note : Free WiFi is only available in lobby . Stayed 11 to 14 Feb 2020 .
Hotel was far from main road . Room were spacy , its suitable for lil family . Breakfast were good with so many option either western or asian .

Upgrade cleanliness for the room please . Overall a good stay in the hotel . Very close to the airport and nice facilities . For the staff , please do not smoke when you are in service with the guest . Keep it up !
The room ok . got extra bolster . Breakfast not really good choise . The swimming pool ok . Easy to double six beach only 15 min walk or 2 min by taxi .
lack options of food , BBQ even not as expected . seem like they limits their food , should asking them every time want to take meal . server also not so welcome .
We found the hotel to be great but the surf waas very very crowded all day and the water not so clean .

When we arrived there was no hassle . we got our hotel cards and straight up to our rooms , which were lovely and tidy . Great for what we paid . The hotel is close to shopping destinations and right across the road fro the beach . Staff are amazing and make you feel like family . they do a lot to please you .

I got this hotel as a package from my Bali ticket purchase from Groupon . It was a really good deal , cheap and with breakfast included . This hotel has a really nice lobby and service staff but the room they gave me was facing just a concrete wall with no scenery at all . The room feels damp / wet and was infested with mosquitoes . Never going back there again .

Booked on a Agoda , photo ' s looked good . The whole hotel is old and dirty see my picture ' s attached . Rang agoda to get refund the Ozz Hotel manager refused . I waisted time and money on a holiday booking . It shouldnt be AVAILABLE on booking sites without upto date images .

Booked on a Agoda , photo ' s looked good . The whole hotel is old and dirty see my picture ' s attached . Rang agoda to get refund the Ozz Hotel manager refused . I waisted time and money on a holiday booking . It shouldnt be AVAILABLE on booking sites without upto date images .

Going back for Our 4th time I January and this time we are taking our family . Rooms are a little dated but clean . The grounds and gardens are beautiful and well maintained and the pool is ALWAYS crystal clear .

The hotel is cheap & Clean , just the location is quite far from the main happening areas at Kuta , Bali ! Breakfast is not proper prepare and the price is high , better to book the room that include breakfast !

labels.opinion: far from the main happening areas

text: Hotel was simple but nice . Good pool to cool down in and breakfast ok . Towels provided , could do with getting new towels as ours were thread bare and had holes in . Short distance to other restaurants and if you want to go a bit further very easy to get a taxi . In walking distance to the beach .

I spent 4 nights here and I absolutely loved the atmosphere . I had all the space I needed and the food was quite good too . It ' s located close to the airport and convenient if you are flying the day after or so . However , most of the top Bali attractions are located far from here which cost me more than I was anticipating to get there .

We stayed for 5 nights at ibis , bali legian . the location is very good . Right in the centre of the town . Rooms are neat and clean . Service is also good . overall good value for money . Also the breakfast was good .
It was a nice and friendly place to stay food was not flash but ok there English could have been better as it was hard to understand at times . there pool area was very basic .

We visit this hotel recomended by kilroy in mid november . Very nice staff and good hotel regarding the cost . The pool area is almost empty so we had it for our selves : ) . We had a plesent stay . Extra much thanks to the girl in the reception who let us use her motorbike to the pharmacy when my girlfriend got sick .

I was impressed with my stay at Dekuta ! The location was great and the hotel itself was nice and clean and had a great pool . I felt it was good value for money and staff were always friendly and helpful .

The staff were helpful and friendly . The rooms were neat but not particularly clean . The pool was lovely . I did spot a cockroach in the bathroom but for what it costs to stay here ( cheaaaap ) it didn ' t bother me .

Ordinary budget hotels in Bali are usually not really hygienic . But this particular budget hotel is surprisingly the utmost opposite . Especially the toilet area . . ! ! kuddos to everyday . Staffs were smiling all the time but it seems that they were having a difficult time speaking English to me . Overall . . . love it and I really am looking forward in staying again . .

Feels like at home . Location is good . Near to sunset road . Friendly staffs . We will stay here for sure when in Bali . Cannot wait and very excited until July 2016 for next bali visit . My kids love to stay here . Minus : 2nd wooden floor is noisy when someone walk will disturb neighbour .

I have stayed there for 3 days with family . Location is very good . Hotel staffs are friendly and provide all helps and recommendation . I would recommend to stay there when you are on solo trip . You can find other better options when you are planning trip to Kuta along with family .
I ' ve new here twice and loved the pace ! Friendly staff and nice atmosphere ! Rooms are not excellent but clean enough with laundry service ! A little pool area with showers !

I visited the hotel for a short stay , business meeting . The hotel is located in a resort with beautiful gardens , pools and includes free access to private beach club " Klappa " . Staff is very friendly , helpful and flexible . Restaurant offers good cuisine . Rooms are exceptionally spacious .

Highly recommended . The hotel is near the malls , money changers , shops , and especially the beach . The whole staff was friendly and accommodation though the food needs improvement . Overall , the experience is very good .

Clean , safe and no frill hotel . We did not dine at the hotel as so many eating out options are available right outside the hotel . Small grocery shop on the left side of hotel for your quick snacks fixes .

Cocok untuk backpacker maupun orang - orang dengan budget terbatas . Meski demikian , spazzio cukup nyaman . The security cannot help anything . When i want to crossed the street by motorbike , they didn ' t help . just watch me .

Good location , qoute and good hotel . Wifi very slow i hope the will change . breakfast poor . Great staff and friendly . I try to book spa but it was full . They need good restaurant in the hotel . Good luck and Thanks to all .

Clean modern hotel . Room comfortable and fine for what we needed . Roof top pool is lovely however small and minimal amount of loungers although we had no problem getting one the day we used . In fact had it to ourselves for few hours which was lovely .

Suka beach inn is right next to poppies lane 2 and close to legian and also the nightlife , still quiet if you want to sleep in peace . Quite cheap accommodation and facilities are good . 7min walk to kuta beach and staff at suka is nice . Don ' t expect too much of the free breakfast and pool is missing sunbeds . Otherwise a good place .

I stayed at this place during my family visit to Bali . Very beautiful hotel with poor service and maintenance . Cleanliness of the pool is unacceptable . Restaurant staff was friendly . Food is tasty but choices are limited .

Our flight was early in the Morning and know that it wasnt check in time , so i asked them to keep the luggage while we are waiting the room . but surprisingly they give us the key without additional charges , it ' s so flexible and kind management . . they have a nice pool on their top floor where you can see 360 degrees of Bali . .
our family stayed at the Taman Rosani hotel 1 week and was very comfortable . the staff are very kind and ready to help .

Stayed here following a recommendation from a fellow traveller . Very surly staff , unhelpful . However , the room was clean and comfortable . Nice balcony and stunning gardens and pool . But they are SO difficult to contact . By phone or email . I left my big pack there and now back in UK !
The hotel has a great location for its price . They also have a cozy restaurant which facing the kuta road . I personally like the rooftop pool and the water flow in the shower .

Stayed here for 4 nights second floor standard room , breakfast has less varieties but still delicious . Room is spacious and comfy . Staff is friendly , and service is sincere even though a little bit messy . The drawback is that the location is a little bit far from Kuta and Legian , however you can easily rent a bike or get a cab .

Near any area at seminyak , hotel is quite good , service is nice , and the best is the hotel is not expensive haha , been here for 5 days and have no regret . If someone thinks that love and peace is a cliche that must have been left behind in the Sixties , that ' s his problem . Love and peace are eternal .

This old hotel is in the center of the Kuta area and on the beach . The rooms are quite depressing as they are below ground and have no windows . If you only sleep and enjoy the great poolside view the place is OK . Four adults stayed her in the beginning of May 2017 .

Booked in for a week stayed 3 nights and moved over to The 101 across the road . Beds were hard and pillows terrible . No hot water for two days and toilet gurgled all night , No shower screen which made the bathroom constantly wet and smelly .

unforgettable stay ! ! ! fantastic place & people especially the guest relation : miss NOVITA ! ! ! We cant wait to go back ! ! ! The service , the room , the food , the facilities , the location , the whole combination was GREAT !
The hotel was good , and the location was near to the airport . Recommend for family or couple trip . You can rent a motorcycle here , just book to the receptionist and they will help you .

the location is the best , near airport and just walking distance to the beach . the hotel staff is very responsive . the room is spacious and comfortable . the breakfast menu is delicious . will be back to this hotel . . .

They said I reserved a transit room for 8 hours only . Very disappointing . Be careful when Booking . You should talk to the manager about price changes . Good location near airport . Call grab for taxi . Taxi drivers at airport wanted over 22 .

The rooms are good for the price you pay . But don ' t be fooled by the Kuta association . The beach is not very accessible . If you desperately need to see the sea then there is a walk through the car park of the Mall close to Fave . Nothing much .

Staff are very helpful , approachable and attentive . Location are very near to amenities ; walking distance to malls and beach & very near to airport . Room cleanliness is excellent . Overall , all are beyond expected .
We really enjoyed our stay at kutabex hotel . . they dont have any room with view to the beach ( unfortunately ) but it paid with the warm and professional service from all staffs .

me and my friends visit bali indonisia for holiday we book flight ticket and hotal booking though dpauls thay provide this hotel . nice hotel staff is very good i is the best thing which i like roof swinging pool every day i enjoy this pool .

I stayed here during Silence Day with my husband and I like the service , I complained about the TV , and they send Engineering staff to fix it right away . I would definitely come back and stay here again . I love the bathroom too . Its very big and comfy .

I found the rooms to be very old fashioned and needing some personality . The bathroom needed a make over and definitely a new shower curtain . The walls need some pictures . . . the couches need some cushions . . However the breakfast was yummy and the staff lovely and helpful . Ayu and Kris were just lovely and so helpful .

I arrived at 9 pm , they said my room is broken etc . . they have to fix it . . i have wait until 12 . . the truth is there still a guest in my room and i have to wait until the guest check out . . omg their service is really really bad please choose other hotel . .

There is no lift . WiFi does not work in rooms , it only works in restaurant and lobby . Food is also average . Not much variety . However rooms are good and neat and clean . Staff is courteous and the location is good .
Everything was great , , , for the price , I could not fault the hotel , the only thing I could say is that they need to put power points in the bathroom , other than that everything was excellent .

labels.opinion: they need to put power points

text: Aircon in the room was very bad . They did aircon servicing twice during our stay post complaining multiple times . Towels , bedsheets etc are really bad . Only good thing about staying here is walkable distance to the beach , indian restaurants is within 1km .

Over all satisfied , room is clean and tidy , even though it could be noisy dependant on guests as walls are paper thin and no soundproof throughout hotel . But sadly , reservation process was taking so long idk why .

I stayed for one night in j boutique hotel . However the hotel location is nice , easy to find food and walking distance to have shops , souvenirs and malls . The room is just worth for money . My suggestion is the hotel need to improve the cleanliness of the bath room , some of people really sensitive with this issue .

Wanted to have a relaxing night before flying home to Europe after a few weeks of accommodation on a budget . This was certainly a good option . I would have liked the option of making tea or Coffee on my room , but couldn ' t find anything like that . An ashtray on the balcony would also have been nice .

It can support your both need . . business and leisure . Near to kuta center and business spot . Very close to so many restaurant . But the street always trafic jam better if you walk or use online taxi . So noisee from the street .

Lovina beach hotel was a great stay , however when dealing with the man in charge of booking our rooms he got overly aggressive because we tried to haggle a lower price for 3 rooms , when the hotel was basically empty .

Stayed here for two nights , great big rooms with good service . First night - AC broke down and had to call engineering , still not fixed , moved room . Hotel is slightly old but well maintained . Breakfast selection was good . Definitely would stay here again given the right price .

Knocked them down to 70k from 80k for a 2 story family bungalow . Very clean and great lounge and balcony . The beds were rock hard otherwise a fantastic place to stay . Breakfast was included . Simple but tasty . Great location and heaps of parking as we had a hire car .

I stayed here with my mate for 7 days . Very happy with the room beds were good and location was perfect . Great food at the restaurant ' Sandbar ' . And i would like to thank Linda for making our stay that much better . The pool bar was not open but were able to get served drinks from the sandbar . Security was good felt very safe .

Had a really nice stay here . Lovely staff and really nice rooftop pool . You could rent a bicycle or scooter and it ' s close to the Discovery shopping mall - exit the back to take a shortcut to the beach .

At first sight it looks like a luxurios hotel but it is far from it . The rooms are very very basic and it is a bit noisy . The breakfast is included in the price and it ' s nice . Staff are helpful and it ' s good value for the money . I would stay again .

The people in this hotel is really helpful and friendly and the whole environment is really good . The breakfast is really good . It ' s near kuta has a nice rooftop pool Kadek is really friendly guy he helped us a lot .

A nice hotel for emergency business stay and budget travellers . Overall my stay experience was good , yet there I was bit disappointed with the absence of the restaurant / dinner service at the time I was staying .

Taman Rosani is ideally located close to Jl Petitinget and walking distance to the many nearby restaurants . The rooms are clean with large bath rooms and those near the large pool are my favourite . This hotel is great value for the area and st this price I can put up with a few things like flaky wifi in the rooms and late afternoon shadows on the pool .

I ' ve stayed here three times and each stay has been excellent ! Rooms are large and comfortable , staff are friendly and caring , location is right on the beach and the grass and pool area is great for chilling out under the palm trees ! Breakfast is just okay , recommend you order fresh .

The worst hotel room ever I stayed ! ! The room wasn't clean , aircond only fan mode was working , WiFi wasn't working at all . Shaggy bed . Smelly bed sheet . Tasteless breakfast . Staff will come to your room and offer you private tour without management knowledge .

Everything is here is Good . . . . . . . . . . . . . . The location is close to the airport . The room , food , and staff is Good . They pick me up in the airport on time , and we got the welcome drink . The location is near the minimart ( Indomaret ) .
standard hotel must have coffee and tea sachet as the compliment in the room , toiletries must be completed including glasses . Shower gel , shampoo , and conditioner should not be all in one .

labels.opinion: should not be all in one
should not be all in one
should not be all in one

text: I loved my stay at fame hotel . The room was cozy and clean . The staff was nice and helpful . The menu was diverse and rich . I wouldn ' t hesitate recommending this hotel to travelers . Besides , the hotel is surrounded by many souvenir shops , beauty centers , and restaurants .

This hotel is clean and has a great breakfast offering , relaxed atmosphere , out of central Kuta , but close enough to get anywhere . It was a lot quieter than some i ' ve stayed in and was well worth the price !
very nice clean and cold and good budget nice and friendly staff and a great location in sunset road would stay here again if we are going with a budget . . . nice and unique ambience . .

nice spot hotel in between rice paddy field , far away from busy noise in the street & nice price too but we didn ' t take with the breakfast . very close to Petitenget - Seminyak area , where ' s a lot of coffee shop into clubs . but quite warm into hot in lobby area cause the ceilings is too low i think .

Very nice hotel in Kuta close to beach and lippo mall . comfy clean rooms and helpfull staff . we stayed there 4 nights . i recommend this hotel for people who prefered calm hotel and relax . city center is in the walking distance .

A VERY LOW BUDGET hotel . Service good but hotel needs repair / remodeling . Internet in lobby worked sporatically . . . . . often not at all . Shower water smelled dirty and not drinkable . Would definitely spend more for a better hotel next time .

Had to wait around for 2 hours because the room had not been clean yet , finally get to my room and there were no towel or toilet paper . . . too top it off the wifi wouldn ' t work and the service desk would constantly hang up on us . . . The room was disgusting filthy including the cups . Never again !

Good hotel as in it will provide you with a clean place to stay near Kuta and Legian . Clean bed , bathroom and basic tv . Nice pool for a dip . A lot of shopping and eating place around Legian and Kuta . Close to the airports . It will cost you 250000 rupiah I think for the airport transfer .

Dear The Alea Hotel , first of all I would like to say thank you for you service for us to prepare honeymoon setup it was really nice . . I got deluxe room pool view the room small but enough for us very clean and quiet area it ' s really recommendation for couple stay in seminyak area . .
Stayed for 1 day after long trip from Amsterdam , quick check in excellent Big room , double bed , very nice pool . Breakfast is very average but its ok consider the prices and location .

Nice to be there . I hope i can visit bali n stay overnigt again in Fame Hotel . Really enjoy at fame . The location of hotel so strategic . So near to kuta pokonya fame hotel sangat bagus . Bersih dan pelayanannya cukup memuaskan .

Tusita is easy to access , and near to lippo mall kuta and souvenir seller . The staff is friendly and good in product knowledge . The room is comfort , clean , and big space . The internet is fast and easy to use .

The building of this hotel is one of the tallest around here , and from the rooftop we could see a good view of the town and the westward ocean and northern mountains behind township , includhng sunrise and sunset scenes .
Small and beautiful hotel in kuta ! Everything was amazing and the breakfast very taste , in the swimming pool have extra towels for everybody . Very easy for rent motorbike with the concierge .

This was my first time to Bali & it was made all the better by stay at the Aston Inn , the room was lovely & the staff were so friendly & helpful , the food was also very nice , I loved relaxing by the pool , I would definitely stay there the next time I go to Bali , ! !
The hotel was clean eventhought not a big hotel , location was near legian beach around 400 metres and you can walk to legian street as well , room design looks modern minimalist .

Very friendly front desk officer , excellent Wi - Fi connection , good services , good view from the top of the building ( the view from swimming pool area ) , very clean environment , great rooms , and food . .

Price really worth , they serve welcome drink and parking lot too . The service is nice . Sky pool a lil bit small . Location really strategic , near Discovery Mall . Cleanliness not bad , just still found some ants around . The shower room only half closed so the water keep making the floor wet .

The facilities overall were actually pretty good , this what made it upsetting that the service and food was such a poor experience . It's cheap compared to some other options , wouldn't pay more then $ 70 Aus a day for it though .

i live only 1 night , quite cheap for the location , near the beach , easy acces to anywhere , breakfast is very standard , room so - so , no hot kettle , no hairdryer , property and standard interior , no sun light come through the room , nice front office .

If you travel in Kuta one nigh without the passport , you cant take a room any cost . In other places we had no such problem and we were very disappointed . Of course solution of this problem we didn ' t receive any help . Hotel nice , place not so good - near street In the sewerage .

Its a decent place . The staffs are good and helpful . Has a rooftop pool . Right near to the airport and is close to a or of restaurants and malls . You also get different cuisine nearby . Recommended for travellers who prefer staying near the airport .

Stayed there for a week with family great place very very good staff and close to every thing . . . well done keep it up . . . . . I will stay here only in my next trip there . . . . see you soon . . . . and make sure you start making Indian chai in your restauRant that is only little thing missing . .

Only here for one night and only been in the bed 10 minutes and we are both itching ! Funny because we was ok endure we got into bed , bar snacks are limited and they didn't have s bottle opener for a bottle of wine or beer ! ! Shocking ! ! ! !

Everything was great . Thank you 😊 The staff was excellent especially Kadek Hotel was good and well arranged . The hotel is located in good area , which is near to everything , also got a great swimming pool on the roof top .
First of all thanks for the welcoming and super hospitable , especially Dina . 😊 Great hotel , value for money , and has comfortable rooms . Thank you for making things amazing . See you again soon .

It was great stay , we enjoyed our stay there . Room was clean , staffs were friendly , food was great , nothing to complain about . Close to convenient store , many shops in the day time . I would recommend this if you want to stay in Legian but in the quiet side .

I wanted a mid - range hotel with A / C which was clean and quiet , and Solaris was perfect . I only stayed 2 days in Bali but I would return to Solaris if I needed a base for longer . The front desk staff were very helpful , especially Ryan , who helped me arrange a day tour and transport . Very friendly staff overall . Great to have a pool too .

i ' ve been here 2night . quite but the room too small for young couple and hotel with no pool and no window . need more variaty food for breakfast . especially nasi goreng with no taste it was plain . but staff was good and fast checkin and checkout .

It is very good location . We can find so many entertainment . Culinary center , mall , Restaurant , and souvenir shop . But we met a dull front officer , so we have bad experience at the first time .

It's a small hotel but beautiful and comfortable . I like the bed , its big , spacious and comfortable . All the room is non - smoking room , there also refrigerator and electric water boiler . I don't see any hair dryer though , or I just missed it . The check in and check out process a little bit slow , but overall a good experience .

The stays was fantastic . Staff ( Ayu ) is very nice . They are all smiling and soft spoken . Location of hotel is also very good . It's situated very near to the local kuta market ( 10 - 15 mins walk ) . We have Indian joints nearby as well and also a mall on the backside of the hotel .

Welcoming staff , generally tidy and quite central to everything . We stayed here for one night after arriving late from our flight . Fine to stay over night . Air con in rooms , fridge all worked well , wifi worked well . Great place to get some rest before moving onto other areas in Bali , didn ' t have breakfast but this was also included and such a cheap price ! !

I love staying at Solaris . . Very affordable price . Food is delicious , room is comfty and clean . I loving swimming at the pool . The only thing that I don ' t like is the internet connection . very slow but if only for facebook and checking emails it ' s still cool . Staff and very accommodating and helpful .

I was their on May 2018 with my family . The hotel was nice & services was great too . The buffet breakfast was fantastic & lots of variesties to choose from . I enjoyed my whole 4 nights stay there but sadly couldn ' t enjoy the pool area as much as I wanted .

This is a realitively new hotel with lift access to upper floors . Very friendly and helpful staff . Great location to the south end of Kuta . Very good prices and excellent rooms and facilities including a rooftop infinity pool with swim up bar . A buffet breakfast was included with our room , and was excellent . The hotel also has its own transport at very reasonable prices .

The staff are friendly , smooth check in . With good price for mid class hotel . The room need some maintenance . AC not working well , there is a crack on wall . Some of light are black out i do not complain since i come for sleep only . Keep spirit hotelier .

I just love everything about this hotel . The location , the helpful staff , the clean and big room , the valuable price and most especially the rooftop pool is amazing ! I will surely book this hotel again when I go back to Bali .

Stayed here first nyt in Bali . its clean . reception is super fast , friendly . location , near beach , but a bit quiet area . I just don like the sink inside rooms , and the cr is soo small and a bit cold looking .

We stay here for 3 nights . The room is good and clean . Bathroom make stinky smell sometime . Breakfast is crap . For the price we pay I kind of expect free wifi . Maybe not in the room but at least the lobby . Staff are very nice and helpful .
Nice hotel . . . friendly staff . . . nice breakfast . . . the pumpkin curry so delicious but not many choices of breakfast menu . . .
Standart old hotel . When checkin try checking room first . . We book 2 standart room . . We get 1 good , 1 less . . Good breakfast here . Position not far from mall . . But far from beach kuta .

everything is great . arrived at accommodation at midnight and received by a nice staff . Check in process didn ' t take a long time as I really need to sleep immediately . The room is cozy and comfort at adorable and affordable price . The food at restaurant are varied and had a good taste , only they need improvement for kitchen sanitation and hygiene .

Good service , friendly staffs , okayish breakfast , neat , average rooms ( value for money ) , 10 mins drive from the airport , 20 mins to Kuta beach and Legian . If you are a party person , u can consider staying here .

The hotel and the location are very nice . The airport is very close . The staff are friendly . Thank you . Rooms furniture are old . Persons . . . Otel ve konumu çok güzel . Havalimanına çok yakın . Teşekkür ederim .

Stayed here three separate times during my two months in Indonesia . Love the location - close to great restaurants , the beach , and shopping mall . Comfortable beds , nice large balcony overlooking the pool , and modern fixtures . Found a great rate on Agoda . Staff was friendly . Thanks Addie !

There is everything you need in a decent and well - managed hotel . Good facilities , comfy rooms , nice breakfast , friendly staff , free shuttle bus to / from airport . Lots of places to eat around , a newly opened shopping mall just around the corner . A little bit noisy , if you have a street view . Otherwise it ' s totally fine . Good value for money .

For the money that I spent , it was a decent stay . Not much of facilities . But then , I don ' t use most of the facilities in a resort . So , I was happy with the stay . Kuta is a happening place . So , lots of super markets and shopping malls .
Stayed here for 6 nights in June . Fantastic little hotel which was very quite ! $ 300 for 6 nights is very well priced Room was good ! Would happily return ! !
Nice little place to stop . Good value for money . Nice pool area and the rooms are clean and tidy . It ' s walking distance to the Kuta shopping area and close to the beach .

I stay at this hotel when there were F & B Leader archipelago meeting on 5 & 6 march 2014 , overall I am satisfied and happy with the facilities and services owned by the hotel . breakfast is good enough for 2 star hotel as Fave , with very good service as well from the restaurant staff . Keep it up . . . !

This was my second stay at the Mercure Harvestland and I have to say that both times I have been extremely impressed The hotel is great VFM for the airport and is a short drive away Rooms are very clean and spacious . The main reason to choose this hotel is because of the wonderful service and staff .

Great location , helpful awesome staff and fantastic room and pool . Was perfect for my stay at Bali . It ' s near to Potato beach club , Butcher house , The Holy Crab , La Favela and many other attractions . Clean room and a comfy bed .

Only 200 meters to kuta beach , less than 70 meters to beachwalk mall , friendly staff , fair price . . . room & swimming pool always clean , i feel comfortable in this hotel ( i was 26 days in bali , last march 2016 ) . . . the best budget hotel in kuta .

We check out late and the reception desk said that there was only one room available ( we already booked for months from traveloka ) . However the room was moldy and the ceiling was filthy , and the pillow was stained .

The hotel has good service , clean rooms , and strategic location but the color of the decoration is not perfect for newly married . They had renovation so it was little noisy for me . My overall experience is good .

I dont know what the hotel is like but the live music in the bar is fantastic . The restaurant serves great meals at a very cheap price . The staff are helpful and very friendly . There is also a rooftop restaurant with a pool that has a wonderful view of the beach and you are able to catch some wonderful sunsets !

We stayed three weeks in Bali and we spent two days at Hotel Lake View . We enjoyed quality hotel for welcoming people to the nearby Mount Batur and the comfort of the room . Lunch in front of Mount Batur is unforgettable .
only transit , so we stayed only for 1 night and leave in the morning . . . room is clean not too spacious , match with the price , more variance of breakfast please . good location . .

We just had a quick stay here . But we arrived late at night but still got a tour and everything explained to us properly . Love the little apartment . Could Almost live there ! Yes no cutlery but that wasnt as issue for us . Looovely pool and restaurant . Good breakfast and friendly staff . Beautiful grounds .

For those who want to have vacation in the middle of Denpasar & Kuta region , this hotel will provide shuttle bus from 10 . 00 AM to 17 . 00 PM . And this hotel also provide free airport transport from airport to hotel . The food is also good for Indonesian , we stay in this hotel for 5 days and we don ' t get bored anyway .
Love the view and pool , but the water looks little brown in bathtub . The blackout in the middle night makes the bathroom didn ' t flush : ( but that ' s okay .

We always stay here before we move to our Bali timeshare in Tanjung Benoa . Its a great little motel friendly staff a huge pool and so close to Kuta markets and square . There are no bells and whistles the rooms are a bit smokey but the pool and staff more than compensate . Give this motel a go they could do with more custom and deservedly so .

A budget hotel in Seminyak . Not a big property but feels comfort , the staff was friendly and helpful . The room so simple and clean it's value for money is rather cheap . Location in good area in Petitenget .

We didn ' t stay at the hotel , but we did frequent Ted ' s Bar as it was the cheapest beer and Bali cider in the area ! Always icy cold , and always happy hour . Free Wifi , and very pleasant staff . A great stop along Bene .

Not a very sophisticated hotel but does the job adequately without ripping your wallet ! Position is perfect beach is awesome clean Ms not busy ! Give it a shot . A three star for sure but worth it . Close to all other restaurants and coffee shops . Canggu is a cool hipster place away from tourist central .

we stayed in the cheapest room with a sea view , but it was a nice & cosy place . delicious breakfast , amazing sunsets . the staff is kind and helpful , too . prices are a bit high , but you get what you pay for .

Stayed there for 5 days . Was a great stay comfortable bed . room was clean and nice . very close to the new shopping mall and the side stalls . food at Nebula is also very nice with nice atmosphere and ambiance . Will definitly return !

The room is sooo biggg and beautifulll . I love the bathroom haha The only thing that makes this hotel off are the breakfast and the sky pool , sooo basic . Or am the one who expect too much . Overall , i love the place . Nice place to stay with your love one or family .

Just back from bali trip . Location wise is good - which is very near the beach , But the hotel is supper horrible with so many mosquitos and you can ' t sleep peacefully every night . On last night of stay , we killed three cockroaches in the bathroom . I don ' t recommend this hotel - this is one of the worst hotel i ever stayed before .

Was great for us as my dentist the Rejuvenation centre was walking distance . Had nice meals and room was good booked one that's was pool access . They have a free shuttle that goes into the main areas .

New budget Hotel with Good Location . But very NOISY inside , because construction of the hotel NOT finished yet . Dug dug dug . . . . still can be heard very loud in the bedroom . Bathroom very small , almost the same as airplane lavatory . Interesting interior design in the lobby . Staff very friendly . Close to many restaurant and very good location .

This was my first time in Bali and I stayed here the first night . Great price . Location in Kuta was ideal . Wish I had another night but too short a time in Bali , I had to move on . Would absolutely stay here again .

Small hotel just on the border of the busy part of Kuta . No need for taxi to get to the sea . Also on the other more quiet side nice restaurants available . Breakfast didn ' t offer much choice but what was served tasted good . The shower didn ' t always provide warm water .

This hotel was offered along with our trip package and the condition of the room spoiled our tour mood . The standard rooms are worst but the staffs were good but they were not able to make better arrangements .

I traveled in september to Bali , this hotel has a fantastic location on the beach , and next door to a popular beach bar . The food was okay , but quiet costly . luckly you could walk outside and have a cheaper beer and some corn on the cob for a fraction of the price .

Nice and comfort room but feel uncomfortable with the bathroom When someone take shower its heard in entire room . . so my baby awaken everytime me or husband go to bathroom . . breakfast only one kind no variety . .

I am not a type of person loving to stay in a " crowded " place like Kuta . But , just recently stayed in this hotel for a short transit . Nice live music by the entrance . The staffs seemed to be amateur and lack of hospitality . But overall , it is a good deal for a hotel by the beach !

this is a great value place to stay that I found to be quiet and well maintained . staff were friendly and helpful , breakfast basic but ok . location is a bit off the track but close to Mint and Potato head .

When we arrived the air conditioner was leaking and noisy . I have requested to change to a different room . The receptionist was kindly changed us to the next room . Friendly staff and comfortable room . The hotel has a Balinese touch with a combination of modern facilities in the room .

friendly staff , nice and quite when we stayed there . food was ok to eat . bed comfortable but the mattress was a little worn as springs sagged in middle of the bed . nice place to stay if you are on a budget . close to some restaurants .

This hotel is close proximity to the beach , the staff was very friendly , they helped me book my tours and made sure my stay was enjoyable . The breakfast was good , the rooms were clean and they have a great pool , would definitely stay here in the future .

Its a good hotel for its price . It ' s centrally located in Kuta Beach . Malls and shops are of walking distance . You can opt for a longer walk or ride the taxi for 5 - 10 minutes if you want to go to the beach . Rooms are okay and they also have an infinity pool on the rooftop .

Have stayed at better quality hotels but the beats them hands down for value for money . As long as you are aware of the room size no coffee or tea making facilitys and limited breakfast on offering you will have a great stay with exceptional friendlliness and service .

My husband and I were in Bali for our honeymoon and really enjoyed our time here . The room was large , bright and clean and not badly priced . The pool was fabulous and the breakfast was the best we were offered at any hotel we had been at .
Really delicious food , strategic location , clean room and helpfull staff . But the swimming pool was too depth for my daughter . Because she still learn to swim without life vest . .
Postive : + Nice Location + Walking distance from airport ( 1 , 1km / less than 1 mile ) + Near Lippo Mall , Discovery Mall and Waterboom ( 400 - 1500m ) + Spa and restaurant in front of Hotel .

Wonderful staying The staff was incredibly warm , i stay for honeymoon and when i entered the room , they surprised us with beautifully - romantic room set - up . Room facilities works well , foods was superb , and The swimming pool simply nice and clean . It was memorable staying All thanks to " The Person in Charge " at that day - Mr . Willy Purba .

I booked for airport pick up 31st January at 23 : 25 . But the driver arrived very late , got to the hotel after 1 am in the morning ! Breakfast had a small selection and small amount not enough to cater for the guests . Waiting too long for the kitchen staff cooking to fill the buffet server .

Returned to stay at the Solaris for 1week . It still has beautifullfriendly staff . Still good value for money and the brreakfast is very good . Pool was great . You can enjoy a great deal of the surroundings , resturants , the beach and the beautifull sunset all only minutes walk .

This would have to be the worst hotel I have stayed at in Bali . Rats around the pool , cockroaches in the breakfast area . No lighting in hall way at night time . Loud music from night clubs into the late hours . Dirty linen , mould on roof and walls of room . No bacon served at breakfast . The only good thing about this hotel was the staff .

Interesting concept and design , friendly staff , has kids facilities ( play ground , swimming pool ) , strategic location ( approximately 4 KM from beach but it has shuttle bus - but we didn ' t try it ) . Minor issues : limited car parking lot ; the staff forgot to deliver hairdryer , which has ordered twice . But , overall it is a nice place to stay !

Beside the rate is cheap , but the service and facility really give us good experience when we stay in Bali . The room is realy comfortable althought it litle bit small . Walking distance to the beach . Looking forward to come back .

Didn ' t stay in the hotel stopped for dinner while in the area , surprisingly good food and very cheap compared to the others in the area . Menu choice was good , only issue is people smoking in the area and its noisy being in Kuta . Lots of shops to visit before and after you eat .

Every guest in this beautiful hotel has stunning view of the volcano - - that is , if it decides to peek out from the clouds . The food is so - so but the staff is extremely friendly . Heads up : lower rooms are not for light sleepers , as kitchen noises and quarry trucks in second gear going up the mountain road provide an early wake up call .

Best location hotel and close to every place that I love especially Discovery Mall and the beach . Room event though quiet small but its fit me for stay and rest especially during sleeping , bed was comy and the shower was power like it ! !

It ' s a new hotel located far from Kuta & Legian , for those whoever stayed at Tune Hotel , it ' s similar . It ' s newly developed area where it ' s hard to find restaurant unless you need to walk about 10 - 15 minutes to find a proper dining restaurant . It ' s not recommended unless you rented a bike or a car . Need more improvement !

Arrive at Ozz Hotel , from the lobby I can see the huge pool with a lot of sun heat . Want to jump soon . The room is reasonable with the rate . Took a walk from another lobby to Kuta center just 5 minutes . Will be back again to Ozz .

Swimming pool can not swim with open eyes salt clean system . Breakfast every day same same butter same bread 2 kinds and omelet or rice and noodles , same jam , poor breakfast . Rooms are old and filled with old furniture . This hotel needs renovation as the location is good . Price is OK ( we were lucky with good room ) other people only complained .

Fairly small room for hotel for its price range . Although the room is quite neat and clean , it ' s not really hospitable for family or friends . More fit for couple or solo . And if somehow you travel here with car ( s ) I would not recommend it because it ' s really lacks of car parking space . But there are plenty of motorcycle parking space around here .

The hotel is very quiet , location in umalas 2 bali . The room is clean recomended for couple and price for room service not to expensive . Activity during in hotel just swim and swim company with a bintang . . We book room garden suite for 4day 3nights just 1million rupiah + + . .

Hotel has an amazing rooftop pool that is well maintained . Rooms are a good size and clean . However there is a noise problem sometimes when large groups come . Doors do bang quite loudly on closing .

For the four star hotel , the lobby design was very nice . The parking lot was far at the behind the hotel . My room decoration was very nice and lovely , just I find the maintenance not too good . some of the wallpaper was wavy and ripped off in some places . At breakfast table , some clothes are looks dirty with oil stain . The others things are quite standard .

I stayed for 2 nights in this hotel . it was good experience especially coz the hotel has a private beach . none of the hotels in bali have a private beach . the food is good . its little away from the city and other tourist attractions .

Nice hotel , good location , jerman beach just by walking , the hotel beside lippo mall , just 5 minute from airport , friendly staff , nice pool at rooftop , and value for money . Recommended and will come back again .

Hotel is close to the airport , and the staffs are friendly . the breakfast is standard , but thats normal , I can ' t expect for a 5 star breakfast when I ' m paying for a 3 star . Overall stay is wonderful and I couldn ' t ask for more . Looking forward to stay in this hotel again .

Stayed here for 4 nights . It was a good experience from beginning . Good friendly staff . Receptionist was helpful . All required information was given . Only had bad experience with F & B . Breakfast was not that great , can improve by increasing few items for Vegetarian people . I can say Its a good place to stay for max couple of nights .

Great communication , good value for money , clean , very helpful and friendly staff . They organised cheap taxis and helped with all my questions . Asian breakfast with a variety of options . Would recommend .

I say thank you for the Senior sales Manager and the asst front office manager for the service during I stay at this hotel . Please keep it up for the service and the taste of your food . Thank you for the hotel , I can sleep very well during my holiday at this hotel . Thank you for the Hotel Rent Car .

Decent clean hotel in Kuta area . Rooms are spacious . Location is good . Breakfast is below average with less variety . Check in was not smooth . Too less staff according to me . Considering the price paid , hotel is decently placed . Pool is also fine . Food court just opposite hotel . But mind the Chinese crowd there .

Average quality , but still one of the best in singaraja city , and good value for money for budget hotel , need to provide room sandals , good view on the restaurant for early bites , and surprisingly very fast wifi !

We were very reluctant to stay at this Hotel only because they charged us peanuts . However , on our arrival we were surprised to see the hotel . It has got beautiful feel to it . Not a lavish property though but very neat and clean . Nicely maintained . Friendly and helpful staff . Highly recommended .

the hotel is right on the legian street night life centre but because its inside the allyway so you wouldnt let the music disturb your dream . but when its a rainy day you will be hard to walk there by foot because a lot of water in the hole and the motorbike will make you all wet .

Hotel was very good . Clean , comfortable , very helpful staff . Good price . Breakfast was good . For a stop over it is excellent . Central position . WiFi strong and fast . Sitting areas , bar near pool . Lifts .

I have been 2 times staying in this hotel . last time was on 22 Oct 2012 but only for 1 night . In general the hotel is nice , seems still new and located quite close to the airport . But the one that I cannot forget is the minibar . The minibar is always empty . You have to ask them to replenish the minibar each time you check in .

Everything was Fantastic , The hotel is chic , colored with unique “ instagramable ” design , all the staff were friendly , really enjoy my stay . The room was cozy and comfort at adorable and affordable price . The food at restaurant were varied and had a good taste .

old and worn out hotel , obviously need to spend some money on refurbishment and renovation . . . limited breakfast variety and far from Kuta beach compare to other hotels . yellowish bathtub and spoilt air conditioning . . .

stay at their suite room , and they already improve more than the last time i stay there . . . just need more improvement here and there , but overall was still okay . you could consider this hotel as one of your option when u want to stay near the airport .

I stayed here on business for ONE reason only - the promise of internet in the rooms , which transpired to be none existent . Food terrible , tiny portions and expensive for what I was given . For a newish hotel attempting to be a " mercure " it fails on every score .

just heard about this new hotel in Seminyak , made a booking and voila ! accidentally fell in love with this cute green hotel . not a huge resort but definitely a place called home for me . friendly staffs , lovely breakfast and nice rooftop restaurant with some little vintage touch . surely will come again with my family .
comfortable , beautiful place affordable And exclusive They have great food , greet view . .

We ' ve stayed here 11 nights . Hotel is really nice , room was lovely , we ' ve just really dissapointed when we ' ve seen bathroom which was really old and in bad condition . Swimmimg pool was amazing , we would just suggest to get more then 5 sunbeds . Breakfast was always lovely .
I was told for Superior room but was offered the standard room and superior room seemed to be with a view and the room i was given did not have a view at all . Will never book through CLEARTRIP .

Reality is not reflected by the photos . I think that this place was flash and very nice a few years ago but the room , bathroom and pool area was a bit tatty . Still , it was good value for money and cheap and cheerful , but I think the photos should be more representative .

Halal logo spotted . Good food and cheap . Cozy room - deluxe . Walking distance to Krisna souvenir shop on the left from hotel lobby ( about 20 mins walk ) , and kuta beach on the right ( about 30 - 40mins walk ) .

Lovely beachfront hotel . Clean and very tidy . Unfortunately the pool was closed due to algae bloom during our short stay but was clearing as we left . Included breakfast was ok . Good choice for short or overnite stay .

the hotel is situated at a very nice location it is near the beach , bar / restaurants , stores . the hotel staffare friendly and hospitable . they have a basic room facilities but had a nice ocean view . nice and very relaxing pool area .

A very comfortable place to stay with spacious room . Having a very nice rest after a long tired day . Delicious breakfast waits you in the morning with various choices . The staff was also very friendly and helpful to assist you all the time . Definitely recommended and absolutely will stay back again next time .

Friendly staff . Bike rental onsite which was handy . Very run down , old looking . Interior rooms were very out of date , the shower needs a shower curtain ( enough said ) . Pools looks old ( so didn ' t bother ) . Location was close to the main road hence very noisy .

The room is small , bathroom is small . but clean and average buffet breakfast . Room service is fast . A very convenient place to stay in Bali . Many mini mart and massage parlor and pubs within walking distance . Beach area is 7 min walking distance . Taxi is available every time needed .

Got a special offer from Tiket . com . . . . Worth to spend and great service indeed . Staffs are friendly and helpful . Great location easy to walk around , not too crowded like Kuta / Legian area . Recommended for those who travel for Business or Leisure !

Grafitti on the walls of the room , mouldy bathroom , no toilet paper , towels or sheets , this place is not worth it . Im sure you would get better for even less money . And the staff - they really are not suited to the " hospitalilty " industry .

Close enough to the beach ( tuban area ) and step away to the nearest mall . WiFi was the best thing for the kids ( Fast connected ) and breakfast were good with some various options . They also provide bicycle rent in cheap price basis on per hour . Check in / out process were smooth with quick service . Good to tusita hotel .

Rooms are comfortable and clean , the food was just exceptable , the actual premises needs a refurb , looking old . However I found the staff were excellent , very friendly and obliging We had to request for a fresh towel daily as they don ' t change it unless you ask . Towels and bedsheets were not clean .

Overall rooms was comfortable for budget hotel . Staffs were very friendly and helpful . Many choices of breakfast . Good internet connection . The location is a bit far from other tourist attraction , however there are shop lot within walking distance .

Great for a last night before flying but the beaches nearby aren ' t the best and the water is clearly quite polluted . The hotel does have a wee rooftop pool which is a great place to watch the sunset from .

This hotel & villa is very good . The rooms are spacious , clean . The facilities are awesome . All is perfect . But the breakfast is horrible : The cheapest white bread , very bad coffee , and even the fruits were sad .

The hotel so clean and comfortable , nice pool in the rooftop , so friendly and helpful staff everyday assist us from the breakfast place until housekeeping and Front liner . Only one suggestion for the fresh egg counter in breakfast it will be perfect . Thank you for the hospitality .

An absolute beautiful location , the property is quite old and tired but I found the whole experience relaxing and outstanding value for money particularly when the property next door was 5 times the price . Staff well and truly make up for the age of the property .

If you want the most amazing view then Lakeview will provide . Unfortunately it's only real asset . Room - no fridge , fairly bare , poor shower otherwise comfortable . Service friendly . Breakfast very poor - no juice , bacon , maximum 2 eggs per person , etc . very basic .

actually its my 3rd visit in Fame Hotel Bali , , still Recommended Hotel in Kuta Area , funky staff and ambiance , good prizes and nice breakfast . Thank you Pak Ruli for your kind assistance . . . success for Fame Bali . . . .

Very nice local staff . Standard was ok for the price . ( 22 usd / night for dobbel room ) Location is nice , very quiet . Restaurant was slow , but good . Breakfast was ok . Mattresses soft . Pillows way to big .

Booking . Com showed ' breakfast included ' . It cost 75000Rp ( $ 7 . 50 ) each morning . Bed bugs were free . Location good , facilities usual . Tv works , small adequate fridge Aircon satisfactory . Pool is a very leisurely 1 . 28m deep .

we were a group of 31 , who all had mold in our rooms ! It is very damaging for your health , and extremely careless of themanagement / owner , to even let it run in this condition . Even worse is that they have a monkey in a tiny cage . Do not live at this hotel .

Really good hotel . Rooms are really clean , nice and comfortable . Shower is good and really soft beds . The pool looks awosme . All the staffs are super friendly and helpful ! Only thing internet didn ' t work inside the room .

I stay here for 3 nights , beautiful hotel , good location . There are swimingpool inside . But the hotel is not big enoug for me . Room is clean , staff are friendly . I buy this room without breakfast , but i order some menu for dinner , and the price is not expensive but the taste is very delicious .

I went thru hell booking in , No ground floor rooms that do not exist as If tlhey approves of applications to stay there Hard to get it through the o 4th he management what we were talking about . Eventually . we got two o rooms but never again . .

Dirty , awful food , construction site next to it , unclean rooms , noisy and did I mention how foul the food was ? No idea where there ' 5 star ' rating has come from , 3 star at a push . DO NOT waste your money here .
The hotel is only about 100mtrs from the beach . The pool area is lovely but no pool bar . Breakfast is good value , rooms and resort are in need of refurbishment . Towels and mats are very old .

A basic hotel in a small village . Cheap but fine to visit local sites . The rooms are a bit old & worn out but fine to sleep . Our balcony door didn ' t lock ( it was broken ) but the staff assured us it was safe ! And it was . I wouldn ' t stay here long - a night or two is plenty to see the area .

I stayed there 2 times and the second time was really bad . Really snobby staff , don ' t care about you . Room are dirty . I ' ve gone to the tunjung inn in poppies 2 that is slightly better ( but not exceptional ) for the same price . At least friendly staff .

We love this hotel but we ' re so surprised how much it has deteriorated since 2012 . However in 2012 it cost three times more to stay . Great staff . Wonderful complimentary breakfast . Internet good . Corner rooms abysmal . They moved us the second day but this was very inconvenient . The new room was great .

THis is our 2nd visit to Bali and will for sure go back to this hotel due to nice rooms and friendly staff . The hotel provides free shuttle to LEgian str which is in Kuta where all the craziness is !

Loved the location right on the beach , pool nice and cold . Has most amenities although outdated and need replacing . Unfortunate for us that Finns Beach Club has opened next door , but fortunate for the younger crowd - they ' ll love it !

I stay for three night at Amaris Legian . The room was so small , there are leaking from AC , the bathroom was dirty . When first time we check in they didn ' t provide any towels . The taste of breakfast food buffet was not good .

Affordable budget hotel in Legian area . The room is not really small for budget hotel . We had a room with a little balcony straight to the pool view . It is not located on the main street , but still , there a lot of bars nearby the hotel .
Hi here again at the Bali Summer , just a quick response to most of the bad reviews that I have been reading on this site about the hotel and staff .
Very nice hotel , staf very frendly . Beds super comfy , rooms clean every day , shower not good . hotel area very clean , and cute , pool clean . Love to stay there , next time come back again .

The room was very old and poor . Smell of sewage around the room . The hotel staff is not nice at all . The dinner was not tasty , and the breakfast at 3 : 30 in the morning was just old dry cake and coffee and clementine . The view from the hotel is wonderful .

very comfortable and friendly . . . . perfect location . . . shops and places to eat perfect place to recharge your batteries before heading either back to airport or onward island hoping . . . Thank You again . . . .

Older cheaper Bungalows ( 180K ) spacious but in bad need of some maintainence and bathroom clean and upgrade . Very quiet except for early morning roosters . Great pool area , basic breakfast included . No room service unless you chase them to do it . Better , higher priced dormitory accommodation at rear worth checking out .
Good priced , clean modern hotel in the heart of kuta poppies lane 2 ! Less than a minute walk from the beach , shops , bars and restaurants . Nice friendly staff .

you get what you pay for , great location , friendly staff , but hotel needs major renovations , rooms full of mould , broken tiles in bathroom , stains throughout bathroom , water pressure terrible and constantly cold water , wifi never works , beds are outdated foam mattress . aircon need replacing , hardly blow cold air out .

Good service , excellent location especially for golfer . Very close to dreamland beach . Pls provide more shuttle for more convenience since located rather remote . Overall , i gave 90 of 100 point . Kereen .

Do not expect a great deal of flair from this place , but it will definitely serve you with small but clean and utility rooms . Decent pool and amenities and wouldn ' t expect anything more for the money we paid . Do not follow the google maps as they have a wrong pin and will take you to incorrect location .

Great stay at the end of our 15 night holiday . We stayed 2 nights . 2 families , 4 rooms . Rooms were clean , air con good , great location right on the beach . Pool ok size , food in restaurant ok . We had teenage boys but not much for families with small children at this resort / hotel . It takes about 30 mins drive to get to Seminyak .

The lobby will make you think you are in a 5 star hotel but just take the elevator to the second floor . You ' ll feel like you are in some student dormitory . Very outdated with peeling paint and rusted shower doors . Smell of chlorine and little kids running all night long . It is very close to the airport and walking distance to Kuta main street .

My partner and I stayed at the alea as a honeymooner . The room was great , clean and relaxing . Regret to say that the wifi connection is so slow and need to be improved ! . . The rest is just good ! Thank you for having us . . .

Service was good but rooms were a little run down for the price . Decent location but for the money better can be had . Looks were deceiving as the main entry looks classy but rooms are a little gammon . I would go back but ask to pay alot less .

Location in the heart of lovina beach . This hotel is an old hotel but condition is good . Price for dolphin tour is good . I got IDR 85 . 000 for dolphin watching and IDR 85 . 000 for snorkeling . Their staff also helpfull .

We have stayed at Dekuta hotel a few times now when in Bali . It is good value for money and only a few minutes walk to the beach . The rooms are nice , staff is helpful and the restaurant has a nice and healthy selection of breakfast choices . There is also a small pool if you fancy a dip . Recommended for its central location and easy access !

Nice hotel . . Good location , right in middle of city . Mall , all good restaurants near by , beach and water park . . Near to international airport . Good roof top swimming pool . . Good for privecy . . Overall good experience . .

Everyone was very welcoming and happy to assist with any queries we had being our first time in Bali . The room was nice and clean and serviced daily . The hotel was on a major road but taxis were readily available .

Last minute accommodation grab after flight cancelled . . . . close to airport but pretty dingy and although staff polite we were kept waiting ages at reception . Room on ground floor really smelt bad ! Was coming out of shower drain . yuk . Stains on sheets also .

Very clean and tidy rooms ! The people here are very polite and nice ! Great hotel ! Highly recommended Dewi at D ' Bale restaurant is lovely and very friendly and speaks very good English . Would stay again !

You get what youve paid , this cheap hotel offers a small room and standart facilities . But i give 4rating because the staff is really helpful . . they help me with the transportation during my holiday . This hotel located about 10 minutes from kuta beach , perfect for those who needs to stay away from kuta ' s crowdness . .

The hotel located in the busy Legian street in Kuta . The staff are friendly and helpful . The room is decent size and clean , although the bath room rather on the small size , but considering the price of the hotel , its a good deal .

only stayed for 1night but was a very nice hotel , dont really think it was worth the price but was a very pleasent stay , really clean and comfy room the only thing was the bathroom was not up to the standard of the room other than that i cant complain ! WOULD RECOMEND !

labels.opinion: dont really think it was worth

text: Great customer service and very helpful staff . Budget rates and budget facilities . Deluxe room with double bed but no chairs or table to do paperwork . A small kettle but no microwave , ironing table or iron . Breakfast include and there is a choice of menus to choose from however if you are here for more than a week it lacks variety in its menu .

This hotel is quite near to Kuta Beach , the room is clean , the staff are helpful and it ' s quite cheap but the facilities is very good and also comfy . If you want to save money , this hotel is the best deal .

First time ever I went to Bali bringing a jacket . Located in highland Kintamani area , Lakeview is a great option if you are bored with beaches and hot sun . Stunning view from the rooms as well as sleeping quality was excellent . I recommend anyone to stay at Lakeview Hotel either with family or friends .

Close to the airport . . nowadays closer to airport is very important since Bali on the high season will be stuck by traffic . . I have booked for 3 rooms . . 2 with connected door . . efficient and worth for families . . not superbly clean but it ' s OK . . we didn ' t spend most of the time in the rooms anyway . .

Close to beach . Only 7 minute walk if u dont mind walking in small aisle . There is 1 . 4 m pool as seen in pic . Wifi is ok . Breakfast is ok . So it is enough for everything . If you want to rent bike the hotel will help u but make sure u give note in advance .

Great value for money . The room was equipped with all the facilities you would expect from a much more expensive hotel including AC , cable TV , mini fridge , toiletries and good hot water in the bathroom . The hotel is in a modern style and the staff were friendly and helpful . Being in Kuta there are numerous restaurants and ither facilities in the area .

Stayed in 4 accommodations across Bali over 2 weeks . This one by far wins on its pool and the staff friendliness . Rooms were great with four poster bed , tv and wifi . Don ' t miss out on the kind of private beach ( basically walk straight across from the hotel entrance down the alley and there ' s a very quiet beautiful beach there compared to Legian !

It was a good experience of staying in favehotel kutakartika plaza . We choose this one because it ' s quite close to the beach . The staffs were helpful , the room and swimming pool was clean . The meals was average . Unfortunately , in our second day the cable TV somehow has lost its signals . Overall is okay .

We has a memorable trip to Bali and we stayed at Solaris Hotel Kuta . Very good value for money and excellent service . If all you are looking for is excellent service with breakfast at very competitive price , then this is the place to be .

I stayed here for four weeks in July and I can ' t find anything negative to say . The staff were amazing , so helpful and very friendly . The rooms were extremely clean . The food was great . It ' s very close to Kuta beach ( five minute walk ) and numerous shops . I would definitely stay here again and would highly highly recommend .

We stayed at here for 2 nights . Our main reason to stay is the location is very good ! you can shopping surround the hotel area and the budget is reasonable too for the best location . Very near to beach . . But the clean and the breakfast is average . I hope they can improve it !

We ' re very pleased for the assistance of Mr . Anil & Mr . Agus of Le Grande Uluwatu Bali . With his good customer service and hospitality , we made our holiday memorable and unforgettable . We ' re planning to come back next year with the same hotel , the management staff very helpful . Also the room is big and comfortable , the food delicious .

Stay away from this hotel unless you like dingy rooms with no windows , incredible traffic noise , and no room Wifi . The location is central to Kuta , but not near the beach . Traffic is loud . The staff are not incredible friendly . The hotel is new , but built poorly and already looking like it ' s 15 years old .

Staying here for two nights , Rooms were nice and clean but I think need some maintenance special in the bathroom , great selections of Tv ' s Channels and Movies , Staff were really friendly and helpful , good value lunch , Great pool where I can spend my day only for swimming there , Great buffet breakfast . Free shuttle to the airport and Discovery mall .

We have just spent 3 nights at the Dekuta and really enjoyed our time . We loved the location in Poppies II , staff were very attentive and friendly and the rooms were great . We had two rooms on level 3 , both had big balconies which overlooked the pool . Breakfast was included and the food was delicious . We really enjoyed our stay and will definitely return .

This hotel was 4star on 2015 tripadvisor but now they are not keep the good things in this hotel . . the room aminities was not complete . . the toilet door need extra effort to close it ( slide door ) . . the toilet was not clean well . .

Very good hotel for $ 45 a night . Watching the sunset over the pool is amazing . The room was clean and the air con was good . Staff were friendly and helpful . Only reason for not getting 5 / 5 is the bathroom had a mouldy smell to it . I would stay there again .

At the restaurant we had the chicken teriyaki burger which was delicious ! Would have gone back before we leave for another but unfortunately we will not return due to the staff being very unfriendly and miserable . . . Customer service - 0 .

I spent 10 nights here . . $ 32 aud per night . Super cheap . With breakfast included . This hotel was perfect on many levels . Super close to the airport , Kuta main drag and the beach . Its not a resort but its not a bacpackers either . Staff were friendly and accommodating . The daily room service / cleaning was exceptional .

my family and i visited this hotel last week , we were so happy have had a nice and big connected room ( my wife and 2 kid ) . nice swimming pool in front the restaurant , big lobby and so friendly staff . the place near by shopping area . there were big discount for some cloths of Billabong and volcom branch .

Very strategic location , near double six beach and kuta seminyak area . Recommended for the traveler who like to take a walk along the seminyak area with so many restaurants and shops . Breakfast ok , room is clean and comfort . friendly and helpful staff is also the plus point . The roof top pool is not big but enough for relax .

Best part about Puri Bali is the swimming pool . Its location is great , close to the beach , but the room itself is nothing special . It ' s big , but not very clean , like its bathroom . Nothing special , you could probably find something better for the same price .

Nice room and great pool with a bar . Breakfast was ok . Tried to order water to the room twice but it never came . Hotell was half empty but there was no way for us to check out at 14 insted of 12 . Nice scooter for rent at a good price .

Very cheap hotel with very polite and helpful staff . Ok breakfast . Very close to the beach and shops / restaurants . Just need better maintenance as bathrooms are very used already . Nice swimming poll . Just need more sunbeds in area .
