great budget hotel . the bed , room , and all of part is great , valuable for price . but the loction is a little bit far from the beach . the breakfast is not bad , but maybe the menu can improve . good job .

The hotel was spacious , clean and had some great views from the hotel roof pool . However it definitely needed basic hotel amenities like a pool bar and a gym . The hotel is quite far away from bars and restaurants ( 20 min cab ) so do not stay here if you want to be able to walk anywhere . The staff were very friendly and helpful .

Nice and small hotel with great location in the heart of Kuta . The breakfast included is really nice you can choose från several alternatives . On the downside the pool area is in the shade all day . The rooms are comfortable and silent but not super clean . We didn ' t get new towels twice but as soon as we mentioned it we got them .

Still have a good experience in solaris in my second stay . All rooms are non smoking rooms . The shower and hot water is the best . Rooms need bit more attention in cleanliness but overal is still good . The beach is just few steps from this hotel .

the hotel is modern , the room is ok . but please note the bathroom cannot be locked . a 10 - 15min walk you can come to a convenient store . however during our stay , the hotel experience black out twice , and no announcement nor apologize the next day .

Budgeted Hotel , Good Food , Decent Staff , Very Co - Operative Management , Roof Top Swimming Pool is Very Nice . This hotel is not far away from beautiful beaches of Bali , Rooms are neat & clean every time .
Nice place , quiet but in central kuta , 10 min from beach . Good but simple breakfast . AC was defect but got fixed same day .

I stayed here on 29th September just for few hours in the morning to catch my flight back to Mumbai , India . It is very near to Airport . Also , the location is perfect for beach as well as shopping . . . I would definitely stay here next time I visit Bali . .

We booked through agoda . Great price and the hotel attendants offered great service and were all smiles . The room was as expected , the bathroom gave off a little odor though but closing the door fixed that . Beer opener is next to the toilet ? Anyway , we had a nice night here !

I definitely will choose this hotel again . It ' s small yet has great location and not sto expensive . The room is nice , just the door is kinds broken . Yet it still can lock . Overall I am really happy with my stay here .

The breakfast is not good and don ' t have any variance food , and the signal is very bad in LG floor i should going to GF to have signal selular however over all the hotel is comfy to stay and sleep . . . .

Everything ( Service , staff behavior , room etc . ) was good for given price . I found difficulty in breakfast as i am vegetarian . They didn ' t had much options in veg menu and whatever they had , taste was not good .

The hotel is good , except the room in ground floor , because too many mosquitos there . The staf is friendly and nice . The location is good , since iy is only 15 minutes walk from Ngurah Rai Aitport . The breakfast so - so .

Staff never failed to meet our individual needs with a friendly smile and specific attention to details that met our situation . We felt as if we were in a very luxurious atmosphere at a reasonable rate . Staff was especially caring and attentive .

Location near beach , shopping malls , restaurants , kuta art market . Can walkable to anywhere . Lippo mall & discovery mall is nearer . Hotel rooftop can see sunset . Should be back again to stay here for next trip .

Stayed here to be close to the airport on the last leg of our trip . The hotel is so so . In terms of cleanliness it would be 2 stars . Location would be 3 stars . Customer service 4 stars . Breakfast 2 stars . Prices starts at around $ 50 for a standard double room . I think there are better options around if you would want to spend a little more .

We love staying here which is new and across the road is the beach already with shopping street and good restaurant nearby . Staffs are friendly and helpful , they help us call a cab back to airport and cab arrive in 2 min ! And the checking out of the hotel only take 5 min ! Keep it up ! ! !

This hotel is located 3min walk from the beautiful Kuta beach . Rooms are simple but clean . Bathroom with walkinn shower . Room 318 is quiet . Swimmingpool ok . Nebula testaurant in the hotel is serving nice food , Stafff friendly .

Its location quite close with kuta beach ( about 10min by foot ) . They have good price too . Breakfast are okay and taste good . However , the bed , blanket , towel are not clean . There are some stain left on it .

Hotel staff was very kind , helpful . Food was ok . Spot was very good because just across kuta beach and plenty of food and store near hotel . Recomended . A little too bad some facilities need repairment , overall it was a nice hotel , beautiful scene and good spot .

Staff were all friendly . The room was small and had cockroach in our room . The pool was nice and I think it is the highlight of the hotel . The food is ok . We had massage and it was not too bad . Overall it is an average 3 star hotel considering the price we paid .

I experineced the Fame with the Hollywood style rooms and entire Hotel based on Hollywood theme . Awesome hospitality with sereness and peaceful rooms . Very Friendly staff to guide the tourist . Another plus point located in south Bali near to exotic beaches and Airport and ample of Shopping avenues present nearby .

Have stayed at this hotel many times . Now that all the removations have finished the rooms are the same but the bathrooms are so much better . Staff are excelent as always . Breakfast is always good and the staff will do anything to make your stay a pleasant stay .

Stayed in Alea hotel twice , Like it so much specially reception staff are very helpful , friendly The hotel for the price I got deserved more . just need some small , tiny renovation But still if I compare it with other hotels stayed is the best one in this category .

Nice hotel , friendly and helpful staff Breakfast and dinner was great Spending the day at pool was great with warm and genuine service from Dewi . Overalls nice experience to stay . Recommended to stay in Bali .

The hotel is conveniently located in the center of Kuta with easy access to all the shopping malls , supermarkets etc . We spent 3 nights here on a bed and breakfast basis . The breakfast buffet had a vast variety of food and even a special corner for vegetarians and action stations . Rooms were well maintained , sufficiently spacious and equally comfortable . I would totally recommend this to another .

We had an excellent stay for one week . Staff is very welcoming , the room was clean , well kept , and quiet . Located a 3 minute walk from the main road with plenty of services and restaurants , but also a short ( approx . 5 minute ) walk from a very nice and clean beach .

Very well recommended hotel . My family and I had several times stay here . The hotel location is closed to the airport and public transport , the room is clean , the staff are friendly , and the swimming pool is nice . We will stay again in this hotel next time we visit Bali .

Good hotel in balance Price / Quality . Clean , good service and friendly , also modern . Nice pool at top riff and close to main street , mall and airport . Quiet hotel inside , good insonorization , friendly workers .

We have stayed here many times and have always found this place to be very hospitable . Nice staff and good sized rooms . Decor is Dated but is not a problem . It is nice to be in s traditional hotel in a great location rather not than one of the modern monstrosities .

Customer service is the worse ever in Bali , so many mosquito , air con leak everywhere , when we book they said we get free Internet but we have to buy drink to get the password , breakfast suck , we ask for queen bed but they put two single bed together . This hotel only good for backpackers , we ended up checking out 3 days earlier and move hotel .

It was my second time stayed at this hotel . During my business trip a week ago I found all services are still same . Room , food , staff are very good and make me feel so comfortable . Compare with another budget hotels , this hotel gives more than I expected .

Had to call waiter over for a drink after 30 minutes . Ordered two pizzas , chips and garlic bread between us . Each dish was brought out separately with 25 minutes in between them . Garlic bread was just a lot of cloves on warm bread and the pizza was a frozen base . Did not get offered a second drink . Staff sat around on phones . Disappointing as the views are beautiful .

I think I can say it ' s the worst hotel I been to in all my trip to Bali ! The staff is unfriendly and give really bad service . . . No towel , no sheet . . We have book for 3 days but we only stay one night ! For the same price or little bit more you can have way better !

Lovely location . . ! ! ! This hotel is surrounded by nice restaurants and bar . . . They also have good restaurant on the rooftop to have some drink and enjoy the sunset . . But the swimming pool is too small for adult . .

Always have the best time at Lakeview , all of their rooms have a balcony to enjoy the magical sunrise of Kintamani . Room are very clean , good effort to reduce plastic use since I notice that they use glass bottles in room and have a refill station in the lobby and restaurant , well done Lakeview !

Stayed for a couple of nights , very clean room and bed linen . Water provided each day and mosquito coil provided each night , an excellent idea which we wish others would do ! Pool is small but clean . Decent choices at breakfast but no fruit or juice . Restaurant in the evening a little disappointing and expensive . Staff very friendly and welcoming .

This hotel is a good deal because it comes with only basic amenities . Things are simple and sometimes rough around edges , but its best feature is that it ' s a budget hotel relatively far away from the noise and annoying touts filling the rest of Kuta .

Visited with friends for a meal , great service , really good size portions and very reasonably priced too , staff were very attentive , quick service and all were very satisfied with the food they had delivered to them . This restaurant is part of a new hotel complex . You won't be disappointed if you go !

Our room was damp and smelt absolutely vile , the bed sheets were filthy ; stained with blood and grime . The food was awful , microwaved and over priced . The staff couldnt give two hoots about service and looked like they would rather be at home .
We stay in this Ibis Hôtel 2 nights , the breakfast is very basic but the situation and the person who was at the lobby was very efficient and nice !

Very pleased with my choice at Mercure Harvestland Kuta . Every aspect was excellent except for the occasional foul smell from either the room toilet or air conditioning . The staff at reception desks , security and restaurant provides service with a smile . Highly recommended .

It ' s great considering the value for money and location . Great Budget Hotel Its in between two of the major shopping mall , discovery and lippo mall . and all the good restaurants are nearby . Swimming pool zone is not yet properly opened . And it gets closed by 6 PM , which is very early . There is no air ventilation inside the Life which is a bit suffocating sometimes .

very good located , the hotel needs maintenance and renewal . they have bugs and cockroaches . I would not recommend breakfast ( although only 6 euro ) Not many choices for dinner and not the best taste . . Hotel was not expensive , got what I paid . the free WIFI was very good ! ! !

Stayed at this hotel for 3 nights . Is very nice and clean . Close to the beach and has a lovely pool . Has everything you need in the room - fridge , aircon , hot water , TV etc . . . Breakfast is included in the price and is nice enough . The only bad thing is we were on the ground floor and there is HEAPS of mosquitos .

The hotel has a direct access to dreamland beach . The staff is very helpful and kind . Breakfast is a mix of indonesian and western cuisine . The rooftop pool is beautiful and never too busy . We had a great time overall . We rented a scooter at the reception .

Service was great , everyone was extremely friendly , food exceptional especially yuni at the bar she was very helpful . I had an hour wait while waiting for my room to be ready . She made it feel like 5mins with excellent service , genuine conversation and big smile . I wish her all the best in all of her endeavors .

A very clean n cozy hotel . . . good water shower with nice hot water . . . fast internet , good tv cable channel . . . food for the room service is delicious n reasonable price . . . Comfortable room n bed . . .

Good room everyday new linnen , the badroom can be cleaner . Near the mall , also near the good restaurants , only a few minutes walk to the mall next door . Not to far from the Ngurah Rai airport , 15 minutes by taxi .

Everything in here is good . . all about hospitality here is perfect . Close by kuta . Night club . Shopping centre and cinemas . Breakfast . Room . Staff . Hotel area is good . Thank you for every single all of you make our stay is memorable .

We stayed at kuta central park hotel for 6 days . When we booked our stay they had a promo which is book 5 days + 1 night free stay . With the inclusion of two way airport transfer and 10 % discount on food and beverages . The location is good as well as the food and and room amenities .

* It was a good and relaxing experience . . * Room was spacious . * the View from the balcony was amazing . * Swimming pool was good . * Room service was so good . * Shuttle services ! * Absolutely worth every penny !

Good hotel . 15 min walk to the beach . We had no view from the balcony but was a fair deal for the price . They could have refilled the soap and stuff in the bathroom . Beds were good and breakfast was oke . Staff was very kind !

If you want something a bit cheaper and arent fussed by all the fanciness of the 5 star places this is a great place to stay . It ' s walking distance to the beach , shops , market stalls , restaurants . Breakfast was included and was so delicious . Love it !

We were offered free leg massage during our booking but they did not care to offer the service though . Close to Kuta beach and Beach walk mall . Airport can be reached in 15 to 15 mind . Location is the only plus . No lift to 2nd and 3rd floors . Difficult to get the luggage up and down .

Very good to stay at fame hotel sunset road . The staff are really kind , helpful , and give an excellent services . Also the room is very clean and comfortable . And the hotel are located in strategic place which is good .

This hotel is clean , staff is friendly , rooms are small but the price is low compared to other places in that area . It ' s a good hotel for very reasonable prices . Motorbike rental here is little too expensive compared to other places .

Have had an awesome time in bali made even better by the kindness and helpfulness of the staff . Nothing was ever too much trouble , wifi was a bit touch and go and different fruit for breakfast would have been nice but that ' s it .
Room was nice and clean although they could do with some new sheets , clean but old . Fantastic location . Pool was good , nice and cold . Food was okay for the price , room service was prompt .

Its location is close to the airport , only about 30 minutes , providing airport shuttle , very surprised when entering the elevator there is a distinctive smell as well as entering the room . overall this hotel is pretty good but the swimming pool is very small and room 106 is very noisy from the vehicle because it faces the road .

Nice hotel in indonesian style . Great service and good location . Pharmacy , mini market , bike rental , small restaurant are all the next door . A little bit far from beach , but very quietly place . The only thing I didn ' t like was breakfast .

This place was terrible . . . What you see in the pictures online and what you get are worlds apart . . . I would advise anybody considering this hotel to book elsewhere . . . The only this I can say that was good about this hotel was the buffet breakfast but that doesn't make up for the quality of the rooms . . .
Family all had steak sandwiches which were nothing to rave about . I had the sate which was quite nice . Grill smoke was blowing through the restaurant . Staff were friendly and helpful .

I stayed here last week with two friends , we knew that it was quiet isolated which was fine but the restaurant food was dreadful and they ran out mixes for the cocktails . On the plus side the breakfast was really good and the spa treatments were wonderful , it would have been nice if we had a kettle in our room and the rooms I think were over priced .

The price per night at Suka beach is very cheap compared to what we would pay at home for the same thing yet it is Bali so we expected a better standard for what we paid . The facilities in terms of pool and dining room are really good but our room and deck were not very clean .

Somewhat dirty room , leaking toilet , power cut at 6am for more than 30 minutes ( apparently the engineer wasn ' t there to start the Genset ) and then the water ran out for a further 30 minutes ( as pump had no power . Won ' t be back . The only redeeming feature , the breakfast included excellent Black Bali coffee !

Near shopping spots , Lippo Mall Kuta and plenty of restaurants . Although the elevators need fixed , our room was comfortable . This is affordable hotel that has many choices of international television channels .

The staffs were friendly . Really fast check in and check out procedure . I got a free late check - out up to 5 pm as an Accor member . The room was nice but still not as elegant as other Mercure hotel room that I ' ve ever stayed . It seemed that it was one level below another Mercure standard . Breakfast was OK , but not so many choices .

It ' s always good to be back to Bali and stay with this property . easy access to reach and find place to hang out Makes me fully rested and warm staff , with limited breakfast need to make sure all the items refill all the time .

This hotel has an awesome location and wonderful gardens ( the only thing that seems to be properly maintained ) . But apart from that everything seems to be falling apart and needs some care . Rooms are cold ( in atmosphere , not temperature ) , plain / loveless interior , shower / sink / taps etc need maintenance , lots of ants in our room . . . Staff are friendly though .

Great and helpful staffs . It was raining when I arrived there . The security kindly asked me to go straight to check in counter and offered himself to park my motorcycle . The room was clean and nice . The room service was also great .

Stayed here for a night . Like d reviews say it is clean , new and affordable price . Only 1 complain is that from inside the ( small ) room you can hear voices outside as it isn ' t very well sound proof - ed . Apart from that it ' s great !

WE GET MORE THAN WE PAY , . . We stayed here for 5 nights . Valuable stay , nice location , profesional service from the staff and good breakfast . Near to the airport but need to take taxi to kuta beach around 20 thousand rupiah . We ' ll stay here again if come to Bali .

We arrived late and were greeted with both friendly smiles and helping hands . Although we only stayed two nights I would be happy to recommend this boutique hotel . Although there was lots of breakfast foods they were not hot enough .
Really like this hotel cuz can sleep well till noon always dark 😅 Little bit problem that we have to take shower downstair but got toilet too upstairs . Will back to this hotel again . Recommended .

This hotel is good for budget conscious travellers . The staff was friendly and nice . The facilities were clean but a bit old . Motorcycle and taxis are plentiful on the road . I avoid the motorcycle as they overcharge . Agree on the price before getting on a motorcycle ! Personally , I prefer the comfort of the taxis , it really much more cheaper .

Stayed in this place due to delayed flight . Cheap hotel , you get what you pay for . Bathroom was very dirty , horrible breakfast , had to search for batman to get a drink at pool bar on various occasion then served in glass full of previous clients lipstick .

We stayed at The Solaris after getting a good deal online . The room was clean , however needs some good TLC . The bed was big and comfy , the bathroom was basic and in need of some maintenance . Based on the price , and other places I have stayed for a similar price I would rate this hotel average . Not amazing , not terrible .
unfortunately , good location and other good things was useless when u serve a terrible breakfast . i hope u serve a better breakfast , in sight of quallity , quantity and variety .
The property was very nice and clean they just opened so it was a lil disorganized room service was very slow once we had to Waite 2hrs for food .

This hotel has an Excellent service . They have Polite and accommodating staff . They Clean the room everyday and extend their helping hand anytime you need them . Nice rooftop bar with a pool . Its accessible to everything . Good atmosphere and quiet at night .

The room is quite old and the environment is not so good . Cleanliness is just average . Room bathroom is pld therefore does not look too clean . And the room flooring is not made of carpet . You can hear noises from next door easily . Breakfast quality is below standard . Swimming pool is just average .

I got chance to visit my friend who stayed this hotel . Food at the cafe is delicious . Cozy and unique ambiance . DIMAS is the best . He go extra miles to pleased the guest for picture taken . Love this place so much . . . . highly recommended .

A nice little quiet hotel . Great rooms with working aircon , working enough that I got cold at night . A fair walk to the main drag though , but if you walk the beach then its a nice walk . First timers , dont let beach sellers into the hotel , if you are going to buy , got out to them . And be sure to visit the dolphins .
I stayed in the hotel for 4 days march 08 - to 13 Rooms were good but lack Furniture like Sofa / chairs .

A real gem , boutique and quaint very Balinese . The staff are lovely and the price is right . The pool is not huge but is clean and surrounded by lovely gardens . We would stay here again as it was very good value for money . The meals too were good value .

A very nice place in Kuta with a very good restaurant vibes . You can chill and walk to go to the beach and the place is very strategic . Need to improve the choice of food for breakfast as i found it a bit boring .

Waiting for reservation took us about 20 minute just to complete . Breakfast no choice at all and the meal was cold . Drink finished no refill and table with Dirty stained . Room do not have any phone . We had suspected to smoke in the room and they refuse to return the deposit to us . Well . it is a very bad experience for us in bali to stay in this hotel .

Definately awesome of you are on a budget , we had a deluxe unit but for a family of three id definitely recommend a villa , but in saying that , we had no problems , staff was nice , breakfast filled the gap and the pool lovely . . .

Nice Hotel . Close to mall and beach . Really helpful and friendly staff . Good breakfast , for those who love Asian food . Nice pool though seems smaller than on the pictures . The room is nice . Clean and has a good bed .

This is a great hotel right on the water front . Rooms are large with the usual facilities . No kettle in room but if you ask it is available . If you like partying the hotel is right opposite Finns night club possible the biggest night club in the world .

The bed was the only good thing in the room there was no where to put your clothes , if your a couple staying more than a week you would go crazy . The breakfast was terrible and we were stupid enough to go to there barbeque night please keep your money and go somewhere else The roof top pool was good but no atmosphere .
Amazing stay . with good breakfast and good maintenance , cleanliness . Hotel staffs were polite and hospitality was appreciable . Must visit hotel for stay . .

Fantastic stay here . Wifi a little dodgy in rooms but great in lobby . Buffet breakfast pretty good selection . Roof top pool . About 10 - 15 min walk to the action in Kuta . Would stay here again . Airport transfers included in package staff went over and above and remembered my name .

Went here for a holiday with friends last week and had dinner in the hotel restaurant . Food was so bad and expensive . I ordered steak which was so hard to chew and made me wanna spit out . Pictures on the menu looks deceiving . Never coming back again .

There will minor flood in the bathroom everytime i had shower . Am travelling with 4 kids but there is no kettle provided . Whenever they want milk we had to order hot water from receptionist but the will only sent a mug of hot water .

We stayed 3 nights for family vacation . Hotel location near discovery mall , many restaurants , beach . Friendly staff but hotel quality is below average for us . Some bathroom door had no door knobs , room paint not good , breakfast tasted average . For cheap hotel , Rp . 420 . 000 at peak season , that was what we got .
This hotel is priced well for what you get . Nice pool and well priced food , beer and snacks . Be nice if they spend a bit more on maintenance though . Showers in the bathroom are not good .

Its locate in the center . Near the Kuta beach and Ngurah Rai Airport . We can find ATM and supermarket easily . Its also near the mall and the spa . . . I highly recommend the variety of the food for breakfast . but overall it was a nice experience staying here .

happines and enjoy to staying in this hotels , near from Kuta beach , shopping centre , cullinnary . Room and other facility was clean , front office and the staff team are so helpfull , its pleasure to staying in fave hotel Kartika plaza .

Warm place to stay friendly staff , have a relax at rooftop pool its so comfort with good music from bar , good friendly service from the bartender mr . Agus , pool not so busy so you can enjoy your time here .

10 min walk to the bounty nightclub and all the rest of the bars . Walk out of the hotel and start shopping its so close ! 5 min walk to the beach ! Rooms wer cleaned everyday and change of towels . Free wifi was a plus and room service food was pretty nice ! Overall my stay at Dekuta was amazing and will defiantly be returning ! !

Rooms are old and look shabby , they urgently need a renovation . The bathroom was horrible , dirty and broken . The restaurant was bad . One star left , but only for this fabulous view of Mount Batur and the lake . Kintamani itself is not recommended .

good location , near from every places that all guest need . great and friendly staff is a plus fr this hotel , really like the breakfast menu too verry like it with their variant and will be back again fr my next holiday . .

Thoroughly impressed with how genuine the staff were , how amazing the layout of not only the hotel but also the rooms . I would definitely come again soon , it ' s worth the visit ! I highly recommend this hotel , it truly embodies the culture and essence of Bali .
The hotel is just nice . Nearby to airport and tourist attractions as well . Easy to get food and not so crowded .

Good location , place & value . . . Clean & Quiet to stay . . . Maintenance must be improve by routine and periodic inspections , especially drainage in the sink and bathroom after guests check out . Reservations staff must improve their skills ( language ) .

Very nice 3 star accommodation . New rooms well appointed and clean . Shower in bath , which some may not like . Very friendly staff and great restaurant with bands each night . Lovely gardens . Pool could do with a bit of an upgrade and more pool chairs needed . Also personally would prefer a designated non smoking area in restaurant .
Cheap and cheerful , having eaten a lot of crap in Kuta , the Nebula bar and restaurant has the best food by a mile , will definitely be back again .

a great rooftop swim and gym while we had to extend our stay due to the volcano delaying our trip home . Had a book a family room at the last minute at this came up at a good price . Limited restaurant choices around but main priority was a clean bed , space and easy access to the airport .
The hotel is very recommended for travelling with low budget . But the room not really big . The staffs are very nice and helpfull , the hotel facilities quiet complete with pool .

Room was not very nice - bed sheets and pillowcases stinky and old . . . room smelled really musty . . . staff very friendly and helpful though . Location fine for walking to beach - 12 mins with 2 yr old . Breakfast ok - eggs good but everything else not too tasty . Would probably look for something else next time in that area if ever .

We stayed at Solaris kuta for 8 nights , we arrived to an extremely friendly efficient front desk they had us in our room within minutes of arriving . Our room was the smaller of the rooms available but we found it more than enough . Beautiful crispy clean white sheets and towels plenty of toiletries and tea and coffee .

Its 1 night type of place , enjoyed the views , rooms were nice , but showers were old and grim . Super loud , surrounded by roads - 24 / 7 motorbikes - maybe best for trecking the volcano so you dont have to sleep for long .

Excellence in service and comfort . Dolphin Trip only great in clear skies . Not too much to do in walking distance to hotel but you can take a ride ( provided by hotel ) to local market . Food is expensive for Indonesia but good .

I visited to this hotel on feb 2017 with my husband . we had made a online booking . The place was nice but room were pretty run down and not so clean . The breakfast there was good and its near to many beach and shopping malls and also very close to Airport .

I only stayed for 3 nights at the beginning of my holiday , and was only in Legian to shop so this hotel was perfectly located for that purpose . My room was clean and functional , with good A / C . I didn ' t have breakfast included but I did order room service and I felt the servings were quite small .

Great staff , clean room , clean public area , good breakfast , so close to the beach , shops and restaurants and very cheap . And very quiet as well ! We stayed four different hotels ( most expensive one was $ 260p / n ) this trip , this was the best one and cheapest one . We ' ll be back . All so good . Thank you .

Stayed here for 5 nights over Christmas ! Great hotel , big pool with comfy sun beds and lovely staff always happy to help ! Room service is also very good here ! We will be recommending to friends and family !

We stayed in this hotel for 5 nights . I have to say everything was much better than in the pictures ! Everything was amazing . The hotel is clean and everyone is so nice and welcoming . The breakfast was one of the best parts . The food in the restaurant is good . I would definitely stay here again .

Very quiet and well insulated hotel . The staff was very helpful with special requests to make my stay perfect . I requested an early check in and late check out and the couldn ' t have been any nicer . I used the concierge to book a driver for a day trip .

Booked this place through Agoda and got decent price for it . As the title says , you get what you pay for , so I ' m not complaining . Towels were changed everyday , rooms were clean , and staff were friendly . Near to eateries as well .

Wow I do not have the time of day to list everything wrong here ! ! Disgusting service horrible rooms gross food ! ! Exploding taps In the bathroom at 3am with no staff to help sercurity say " come back in the morning " if my money is refundable I would have left to the Aromas next door ( excellent ) .
I had a short visit to Kuta . Only 5 mins each walk from the famous Kuta Square and Beach walk where I had my morning run . Breakfast is ok . Room facility is beyond my expectation .

Nice hotel , clean , comfort , and i think its quite cheap while others hotel raise their rate . I got a room with 2 single beds , AC , water heater , WiFi , TV . But dont expect nice view from your window , dont ever expect a swimming pool . I give 5 stars for the clean room , comfortable .

We stayed here with friends as part of a wedding and were made to feel very welcome . The lovely staff and pool area is definitely a bonus . Rooms are very basic , with the bathrooms being very outdated . Other than the rooms itself , the rest of the hotel is great ! Convenient location down a side alley in the heart of Legian .

Rooms are huge , beds are comfortable . The food at the hotel is really good , has good facilities such as pool and gym , it is in a good location and is just a short walk into Legian street . The staff are amazing and really friendly . This hotel is toddler friendly as it has a playground and kids room , the staff are also really good with little kids !

The room was ok , not so great but it is not the worst either , balcony view just facing the buildings . The food at the restaurant was good , we enjoyed the food everyday for the 5 days we stayed there .

By far the best hotel I have been to in indonesia . Best price for what you get . Very cheap , but awesome rooms . Also nice pool . You can also rent a scooter from the hotel . You don ' t pay more than ~ 60 or 70 thousand irp for the taxi from and to the airport .

The hotel is located in prominent area in Kuta . So cozy actually but when i was in room that i was able to heard noises a lot when people were going around , laughing and even talking i could hear clearly .

Great Stay ! Great Pool Area . Great Room . Great Restaurant . Hired a Scooter and drove around Uluwatu . Really nice ! Definitely hire a scooter if staying here though ! Very close to Dreamland Beach , and not far to Finn ' s Beach Club . Also not far to the temple .

We have decided to book something close to the airport after the 18 hour flight . Thankfully we were able to have a good deal with Klapa Resort and no disappointments at all . Great location ( yes it is out at nowhere near but we knew that ) close to beach with direct access . Staff were extremely friendly and accommodating all the time . Food was good and tasty .

Beautiful hotel with a great service & friendly staff . We had such a great experience in this hotel . The location is very strategic and made us easily going every where we wanted . Definitely will come back again in near future .

Had a great stay at Ibis Legian , staff could do with a little training in English , will return again soon . Location is ideal to beach and markets , also lovely restaraunts with great range of foods , very cheaply priced .

Well it ' s not that bad . The staffs are very friendly . Only one problem . The water is salty and very salty . The best part of the hotel is the location . Just opposite of the hotel you can find more or less everything . Live music with good food and cheap shopping all are in the same area .

Hotel seemed OK at first . However we had vomit all down our wall from the previous visitors . Had to ask 3 tines for it to be cleaned . Igarettes were also left in the room . Wouldn ' t even give us a discount for the poor cleanliness . Pool needs some serious renovation .
good property at good location . neat n clean & big rooms good breakfast and rooftop restaurent very bad n non cooperative staff . i was waiting from 11 amanx they gave me room at 2 : 45 pm .

My room on 1209 , the room too small and also bathroom . . . but quality of sleep is good because we get quiet room , and my key card for open the door is error and make me twice asking to reception . . . if you traveller with family I not recommend this hotel , if you single or couple traveller is ok .

Not being a surfer myself I still managed to really enjoy my 2 day stay here . Easy to walk along the beach to different bars and food , and great service when staying in . The food is good , and rooms well kept for the price .

Located in central area but in quiet road . Very close to beach . Room were big and nice . Room amenities were up to date . Pool was very good and they let us swim at midnight too . Staff were very attentive and pleasant . Breakfast was very poor and few choices . Need to improve on it . Great stay and highly recommended .

This was not a hotel to use as a holiday base . However it was cheap . $ 39 USD + + Unfortunately not well kept . The pool was unusable , covered in leaves and sticks , hard to see in the photos . Sun beds have no cushions and no sun . 25 minutes walk to the beach . Not explored outside yet .

It is a nice hotel , with a nice staff , great breakfast . But it ' s very business oriented , so don ' t expect many leasury amenities . The air conditioner was nor good enough . The gym was pretty basic . But in the end it was a very good hotel .

The location is very strategic . But unfortunately , the room is not soundproof . I got a room with connecting door and I heard the conversation from another room clearly . I had bad sleep quality bcos of the noise .

My trip to Bali for second time for own business staying at this hotel due on my villa arround . The Bread on breakfast qualiy need improvement has leaftover from the day before . You need a chef who can control your food more detail .

the first room near the pool leaked with water from the barthroom light . So they showed us 3 more rooms and they had mould everywhere on the roof , had to move our own bags to the other room and we booked tripple share and all they could do was put a mattress on the floor .

The room is comfortable and fit for uninterruptible rest . Its staff is friendly & helpful . I personally recommend this hotel even for long stayers . Convenient stores are nearby but choices of restaurant is limited .

Very good hotel to stay in Bali , hotel staff is very helping . You can ask for any help . Food was good , good to stay with family as well . Hotel location is not far from Kuta night club and beach .

Strategic location . Near from kuta and seminyak . But the room is so small . Good for a few days . I stay for one night . I was confused with the parking area . It ' s like you can parking everywhere but there are many stores . . .
